title.en: Prayer to the Supremely Learned Holders of the Glorious Sakya Teachings

text.en: Kunga Zangpo, prophesied by the victorious one,
text.en-trans: gyalwé lungten tobpa künga zang

text.en: Second buddha, all-knowing Evaṃpa,
text.en-trans: gyalwa nyipa künkhyen ewam pa

text.en: Standing tall among oceanic bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: gyalsé gyatsö ü na ngön towa

text.en: Ngorchen Dorje Chang, to you I pray.1
text.en-trans: ngor chen dorjé chang la solwa deb

text.en: Lord Dzongpa, vital pillar of the teachings of the whispered transmission,
text.en-trans: jetsün dorjé chang né lek ongwé

text.en: Which came down from the exalted Dorje Chang,
text.en-trans: nyengyü tenpé sokshing dzongpa jé

text.en: Tutop Wangchuk Kunga Namgyal,2
text.en-trans: tutob wangchuk künga namgyal zhé

text.en: Great lord of yogis, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk chenpor solwa deb

text.en: You perfectly mastered the myriad texts of the scriptural collections,
text.en-trans: denö bumtrak tuk su lekpar chub

text.en: And constantly beheld the smiling countenance of the protector Ajita,3
text.en-trans: mapam gönpö gyé zhal taktu zik

text.en: Realizing the intent of the Great Vehicle, profound and vast—
text.en-trans: tekchen zab dang gyaché gongdön tok

text.en: Omniscient Sangye Pal, to you I pray.4
text.en-trans: künkhyen sangye pal la solwa deb

text.en: Through your diligent study and critical intellect, you gathered
text.en-trans: do ngak rikné sheja gyatso ni

text.en: An ocean of knowledge related to sūtra and mantra within your vase-like mind,
text.en-trans: namchö tsönpé khyö tuk bumpar kyil

text.en: And were unrivalled in explanation, debate and composition—
text.en-trans: ché tsö tsom la drenpé da dralwa

text.en: Rongtön Mawé Sengé, to you I pray.5
text.en-trans: rongtön mawé sengér solwa deb

text.en: You elucidated precisely and without error
text.en-trans: mapam jampé yang kyi gongpé til

text.en: The essential point of the invincible Mañjughoṣa’s realization,
text.en-trans: manor jizhin ngönsum sal dzé ching

text.en: And spread the study and practice of oceanic mantra lineages in all directions—
text.en-trans: ngak gyü gyatsö shedrub chok gyar pel

text.en: Omniscient Sonam Senge, to you I pray.6
text.en-trans: künkhyen sönam sengér solwa deb

text.en: Preeminent among the myriad proponents of the five sciences,
text.en-trans: né nga rigpa jewé pul du chin

text.en: You spread the tradition of the definitive essence,
text.en-trans: ngedön nyingpö lam sol gyepar dzé

text.en: Great paṇḍita Śākya Chokden Drakpé Pal,7
text.en-trans: penchen shakya chokden drakpé pal

text.en: Great crown adornment of the learned, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khepé tsukgyen chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Through the power of supplicating these sublime ones,
text.en-trans: dampa nam la solwa tabpé tü

text.en: May all obstacles to our attainment of awakening in this life be pacified,
text.en-trans: tsé dir changchub drubpé barché zhi

text.en: And in future lives may we go wherever these supreme guides reside
text.en-trans: chimar dren chok gangdu zhukpé sar

text.en: And savour the nectar of their enlightened speech.
text.en-trans: chin né sung gi dütsir chöpar shok
